name: Dental Defenders
description: Special thanks to Dr. Russell E. White (White Dental in Tremonton, UT) for consulting us on dental needs! Built for Rapid Prototyping class, and designed for mobile use (zip file works on PC, but due to resolution and us not caring about playing on PC it won't have all the animations or work as well) . Only available on Android for now. 2 minute long game, designed to teach kids the tools to use to clean all parts of their mouth!
